name: Wikipedia Dark | aperopia
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document domain("wikipedia.org"), domain("wikimedia.org"), domain("wiktionary.org"), domain("wikiquote.org"), domain("wikibooks.org"), domain("wikisource.org"), domain("wikinews.org"), domain("wikiversity.org"), domain("wikimediafoundation.org"), domain("mediawiki.org"), domain("wikivoyage.org"), domain("wiki.openstreetmap.org"), domain("wikidata.org"), domain("translatewiki.net"){body,div#mw-head{background-color:#494949}a,a:active,a:focus{color:#92b3e5!important;outline:none!important}.mw-body div[style]{background-color:transparent!important}ul{list-style-type:disc;list-style-image:none!important}#pt-anonuserpage{color:#63bbcf}input,input:hover,input:active,input:focus{background-color:#474747!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}div#simpleSearch input{background-color:transparent!important;color:#202020!important}.footer{background-color:#202020}.footer-description-text,.other-project-tagline{color:#fcfcfc}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#dcdcdc}small{color:#ededed!important}.lang-list-content,.lang-list-container,.mw-body{background-color:#3a3a3a}.bookshelf span{background-color:#3a3a3a;color:#ededed}div#footer ul li{color:#9f9f9f}div.vectorTabs{background-image:none!important}div.vectorTabs ul li{background-image:none!important}div.vectorTabs ul{background-image:none!important}div.vectorTabs li.selected a,div.vectorTabs li.selected a:visited{border:1px solid #535353!important;border-bottom:none!important;background-color:#3c3c3c;color:#fefefc;-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0 0 3px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.75)!important;-moz-box-shadow:inset 0 0 3px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.75)!important;box-shadow:inset 0 0 3px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.75)!important}.mw-body{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#3a3a3a;color:#fefefc;-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0 0 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.75)!important;-moz-box-shadow:inset 0 0 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.75)!important;box-shadow:inset 0 0 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.75)!important}.navbox,.navbox-subgroup{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#474747!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}table{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#424242!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}td{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#474747!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}td>div{color:#f2f2f2!important}th{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#3a3a3a!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}.suggestions-results{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#3c3c3c!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}.suggestions-result{color:#63bbcf!important}.suggestions-result:hover,.suggestions-result:active,.suggestions-result:focus{color:#f2f2f2!important}.suggestions-special{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#474747!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}.suggestions-special .special-query{color:#63bbcf!important}#toc,.toc,.mw-warning,.toccolours{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#474747!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}.quotebox,.thumbinner,.catlinks,#wlm-banner{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#474747!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}.reference-text>span{color:#9f9f9f!important}#contentSub,#contentSub2{color:#9f9f9f!important}div.vectorTabs ul li{background-color:transparent!important;background-image:none!important}div.vectorTabs span{background-color:transparent!important;background-image:none!important}.oo-ui-windowManager-modal.oo-ui-windowManager-floating>.oo-ui-dialog>.oo-ui-window-frame{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#474747!important;color:#f2f2f2!important;box-shadow:0 .15em 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15)}.oo-ui-messageDialog-title{color:#ddd!important}.visualeditor-welcomedialog-content-text{color:#9f9f9f!important}.oo-ui-buttonElement-frameless.oo-ui-widget-enabled>input.oo-ui-buttonElement-button,.oo-ui-buttonElement-frameless.oo-ui-widget-enabled>.oo-ui-buttonElement-button>.oo-ui-labelElement-label{color:#92b3e5!important}.wikiEditor-ui .wikiEditor-ui-top{border-bottom:1px solid #535353!important}.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar{background-color:#909090!important;background-image:none!important}.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .group .label{color:#e3e3e3!important}.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .tabs span.tab a,.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .tabs span.tab a:visited{color:#fff!important}.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .group .tool-select .menu .options{background-color:#909090!important}.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .group .tool-select .options .option{color:#fff!important}.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .group .tool-select .options .option:hover{color:#00507a!important}.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .group .tool-select .label{color:#909090!important}.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .booklet .index div{color:#fff!important}.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .booklet .index .current,.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .booklet .pages{background-color:#474747!important}.wikiEditor-ui-toolbar .page-characters div span{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#3c3c3c!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}div#editpage-specialchars a{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#474747!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}.editOptions{border:1px solid #535353!important;background-color:#3c3c3c!important;color:#f2f2f2!important}div#editpage-specialchars,.wikiEditor-ui .wikiEditor-ui-view{border:1px solid #535353!important}span[style="color:darkgreen"]{color:#2dd663!important}}
